languages.text: Воин полагается на свое превосходство в рукопашном бою. Ключевая {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} воинов, Рывок, обеспечивает им высокую мобильность на поле боя и дополнительную атаку.

A Warrior relies on their superior {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} combat. The Warrior keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, Charge, provides them with both great mobility on the battlefield and a way to land an extra {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} in combat.
languages.original_text: Воин полагается на свое превосходство в рукопашном бою. Ключевая {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} воинов, Рывок, обеспечивает им высокую мобильность на поле боя и дополнительную атаку.

traits.locale_text: A Fighter relies on their superior skill in melee combat. The Fighter keystone ability Charge provides them with great mobility on the battlefield and a way to land an extra hit in combat.
A Fighter relies on their superior skill in melee combat. The Fighter keystone ability Charge provides them with great mobility on the battlefield and a way to land an extra hit in combat.
A Fighter relies on their superior skills in melee combat. The Fighter keystone ability, Charge, provides them with both great mobility on the battlefield and a way to land an extra hit in combat.

A Warrior relies on their superior {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} combat. The Warrior keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, Charge, provides them with both great mobility on the battlefield and a way to land an extra {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} in combat.

languages.text: Ein Krieger verlässt sich auf seine überlegenen {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeiten{/g} im {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampf{/g}. Die wesentliche {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} des Kriegers, Ansturm, verleiht im sowohl großartige Mobilität auf dem Schlachtfeld als auch die Möglichkeit, im {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Kampf{/g} einen zusätzlichen Treffer zu landen.
languages.original_text: A Warrior relies on their superior {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} combat. The Warrior keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, Charge, provides them with both great mobility on the battlefield and a way to land an extra {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} in combat.

traits.locale_text: Ein Kämpfer verlässt sich auf seine überlegenen {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeiten{/g} im Nahkampf. Die wesentliche {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} des Kämpfers, Ansturm, verleiht im sowohl großartige Mobilität auf dem Schlachtfeld als auch die Möglichkeit, im Kampf einen zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}Treffer{/g} zu landen.

languages.text: Un Combattant s'appuie sur ses {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}compétences{/g} supérieures en situation de combat de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g}. La {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} clé du Combattant, Charge, lui confère plus de mobilité sur le champ de bataille et lui permet de porter un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g} supplémentaire au combat.
languages.original_text: A Warrior relies on their superior {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} combat. The Warrior keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, Charge, provides them with both great mobility on the battlefield and a way to land an extra {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} in combat.

traits.locale_text: Un Combattant s'appuie sur ses {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}compétences{/g} supérieures en situation de combat de mêlée. La {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} clé du Combattant, Charge, lui confère plus de mobilité sur le champ de bataille et lui permet de porter un {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}coup{/g} supplémentaire au combat.

languages.text: 战士非常依赖高超的{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}技巧。战士的关键{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}{/g}：英勇冲锋，可以为他们提供强大的机动性，还能在战斗中发动额外攻击。
languages.original_text: A Warrior relies on their superior {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} combat. The Warrior keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, Charge, provides them with both great mobility on the battlefield and a way to land an extra {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} in combat.

traits.locale_text: 战士非常依赖高超的近战技巧。{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}{/g}战士的关键{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}：英勇冲锋，可以为他们提供强大的机动性，还能在战斗中发动额外攻击。{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}{/g}

languages.text: Los guerreros recurren a sus {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidades{/g} superiores a la hora de entablar un combate {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}. La {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} clave de los guerreros, Carga, les concede una movilidad estupenda en batalla, así como la posibilidad de asestar un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} adicional.
languages.original_text: A Warrior relies on their superior {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} combat. The Warrior keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, Charge, provides them with both great mobility on the battlefield and a way to land an extra {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} in combat.

traits.locale_text: Los guerreros recurren a sus {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidades{/g} superiores a la hora de entablar un combate cuerpo a cuerpo. La {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} clave de los guerreros, Carga, les concede una movilidad estupenda en batalla, así como la posibilidad de asestar un {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacto{/g} adicional.

languages.original_text: The warrior relies on its superior melee strength. The warrior's key ability, Dash, provides them with high mobility on the battlefield and additional attack power.

languages.text: ファイターは{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}戦闘の優れた{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}が頼りである。ファイターの要となる{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}である突撃は戦場で優れた機動力と戦闘における追加{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}攻撃{/g}の方法をもたらす。
languages.original_text: A Warrior relies on their superior {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} combat. The Warrior keystone {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, Charge, provides them with both great mobility on the battlefield and a way to land an extra {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} in combat.

traits.locale_text: ファイターは近接戦闘の優れた{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}を使用して戦闘を行う。ファイターの要となる{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}突撃であり、戦場で優れた機動力を発揮し追加{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}攻撃{/g}を行うことができる。
